Provisions Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2024” means the Gas (Amendment) and 

Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 11 of 2024).

title: the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.11 of
heading: 4. The 1st day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Act of
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which the Act of 

2024, in so far as it is not already in operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 May, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024.
